title: NDTV World Summit 2025: AI Will Create More Jobs Than It Will Displace, Says Nitin Mittal
description: Artificial intelligence will create more jobs than it displaces as industries invest in AI infrastructure and skills, said Nitin Mittal, global AI leader and author of All In on AI, at the NDTV World Summit on Friday.
content:
Artificial intelligence will create more jobs than it displaces as industries invest in AI infrastructure and skills, said Nitin Mittal, global AI leader and author of All In on AI, at the NDTV World Summit on Friday.

title: Why your SME belongs at the ET AI Awards 2025
description: The ET AI Awards 2025 is redefining the future of business innovation by celebrating small and medium enterprises (SMEs) that are using artificial intelligence to create measurable impact. From financial services to agriculture, these awards recognise the trailblazers turning AI into a competitive edge.

title: Salesforce tries to help ICE boost its immigration force
description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff's support for President Trump has extended to pitching artificial intelligence capabilities to ICE for staffing up immigration enforcement. Internal documents reveal Salesforce's efforts to secure contracts for talent acquisition and AI-driven investigations, drawing criticism from San Francisco leaders who view it as a betrayal of city values.
content:

title: Uber drivers can soon earn extra cash by helping train AI models between rides
description: Uber is testing a new feature in the US which allows its drivers to earn extra money by training Artificial Intelligence (AI) models when they are not driving. The company may rollout this feature to non-drivers in the future.
content:
Uber is testing a new feature in the US that allows drivers to earn money by training Artificial intelligence (AI) models.

title: Nitin Mittal Says Not AI, Worry About Fellow Co-Workers Who Are Adapting
description: Instead of worrying about Artificial Intelligence (AI) taking our jobs, workers must worry about their colleagues who are adapting to AI and showing the curiosity to learn new AI models, said Deloitte's Global AI Leader Nitin Mittal.

title: Vijay Shekhar Sharma presents Paytm’s AI Soundbox to Piyush Goyal, calls it ‘a superhuman capability’ for small businesses
description: In a post on X, Sharma wrote that it was a privilege to present the innovation, adding that Paytm is committed to building artificial intelligence for every Indian small shopkeeper.
content: Paytm Founder and CEO Vijay Shekhar Sharma showcased the company’s Made-in-India Paytm AI Soundbox to Union Minister for Commerce and Industry Piyush Goyal, reaffirming Paytm’s commitment to Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s vision of Atmanirbhar Bharat... [2131 chars]

title: Junk AI reports harming NDIS users: disability groups
description: Disability organisations say the use of artificial intelligence is undermining the integrity of the NDIS process and people’s claims.
